articles.title: Asian shares fall, dollar firms ahead of central bank rate hikes - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares fell on Monday while the dollar drifted higher at the start of a hectic week, as markets awaited a flurry of rate decisions from the U.S. Federal Reserve, the European Central Bank and others.
articles.content: SYDNEY, Dec 12 (Reuters) - Asian shares fell on Monday while the dollar drifted higher at the start of a hectic week, as markets awaited a flurry of rate decisions from the U.S. Federal Reserve, the … [+3584 chars]
